string.text: Explorers
Quest Description
First quest title
Explorers: Find Prof. Kovalev in The Great Swamps
I have received information that Prof. Kovalev in the Great Swamps needs help in his research. I should look for him in the Old Church in the South of the swamps.
Explorers: Find Prof. Markov in Yantar
Next, I should try to find Prof. Markov.
Researchers: Find Dr. Pirogov
Dr. Priogov has been tasked with investigating the Dark Valley. I should check if he is still alive.
Researchers: Find Prof. Chernov
Now I need to find Senior Prof. Chernov, who is in an abandoned shack in the North of Army Warehouses.
Explorers: Find Professor Zhuk
For more work I should tak to Prof. Vladislav Zhuk. I can find him somewhere near Yanov Station in Jupiter.
Explorers: Find Prof. Vorobushkin
Associate Professor Vorobushkin is somewhere on Zaton. I need to find him in order to continue helping the research team.
Researchers: Find Prof. Skabinsky

Prof. Vorobushkin told me, that the head of the operation, Prof. Skabinsky, has already pressed further ahead and is currently somewhere in the northern part of the CNPP. I don't know how he managed to get there, but I need to find him fast.
Researchers: Find Prof. Skabinsky.
Prof. Vorobushkin's calculations are still full of holes, though they seem to point towards the Ashes anomaly. I need to find Prof. Skabinsky, who has already went ahead and is waiting for me there.
Researchers: Bring Prof. Kovalev three anomalous samples
The research team in the swamps is currently searching for samples from some anomalous fields. Prof. Kovalev asked me to check out three of them.
Find an artifact in the anomaly of the Lower Ashes
One of the samples is located in the anomaly of the Lower Ashes.
Find artifact in the Swamp Hollow anomaly
One of the artifacts is located in the anomaly Swamp Ravine.
Find artifact in the anomaly of the Western Swamp
One of the samples is located in the anomaly of the Western Swamp.
Find artifact in the anomaly Razor
One of the samples is in the anomaly Razryadnik.
Researchers: Bring Prof. Kovalev his laptop and three anomalous samples

Prof. Kovalev conducted field research in Agroprom, but he was attacked during his studies. I need to find the laptop he left at the site of the attack and check the data on it. It should tell me, which anomalies I should scan for samples
Find Kovalev's Laptop
The laptop is supposed to be on the second floor of the building the scientists were attacked at.
Find the artifact. Location unknown.
The exact location can be found on Kovalev's laptop.
Find the artifact in the anomaly Old Claws
The artifact is located in the anomaly Old Claws.
Find the artifact in the Anomalous Hollow
The artifact is located in the Anomalous Hollow.
Find the artifact in the Bird Carousel anomaly
The artifact is located in the Bird Carousel anomaly.
Researchers: Bring Prof. Markov three anomalous samples
Prof. Markov in Yantar has asked me to scan three anomalies with my scanner and look out for any artifacts I can find.
Find an artifact in the Zagreb Hands anomaly
One of the samples is located in the anomaly of the Raked Arms.
Find artifact in the Poisoned Lake anomaly
One of the artifacts is located in Poisoned Lake anomaly.
Find artifact in the anomaly of the Concrete Dump
One of the artifacts is located in the anomaly Concrete Dump.
Explorers: Bring Markov three artifacts from the Wilderness Territory.
We need to expand the search area. There is a Wild Territory not far from Yantar. There are anomalous formations there as well.
Find an artifact in the Radioactive Workshop
This anomaly is not listed on the map, but be careful, the area is extremely radioactive.
Find the artifact in the anomaly Train
The object of the search is somewhere in the area of the anomaly Electric.
Find the artifact in the anomaly Sparkling Twilight
The anomaly in the tunnel below Rostock, also known as the Sparkling Twilight
Explorers: Bring Markov three artifacts from the grounds of the Amber factory

Jokes aside. This next assignment will not be an easy one. It is necessary to find three artifacts on the territory of the Amber factory closed by psi radiation. This is impossible without a psi helmet.
Find the artifact in the St. Elmo's Fire anomaly.
The object is located in the anomaly St. Elmo's Fire.
Find artifact in the anomaly Wandering Lights
The object is located in the anomaly Wandering Lights
Find an artifact somewhere in the factory.
No one has ever gone that far. But quite a clear signal comes from somewhere on the territory of the factory Amber.
Researchers: Bring Candidate Pirogov three samples from the Dark Valley
The Dark Valley is dangerous for a quiet search for artifacts. Mutants and bandits can lurk around any corner. Nevertheless, you need to bring three anomalous specimens from there.
Find an artifact in the Comet anomaly.
A curious anomaly that few people have explored. But for sure there are the samples we need.
Find artifact in the Dark Fault anomaly
The anomalous specimen is somewhere in the Dark Rift anomaly.
Find an artifact in the Deathcloud anomaly
The Death Cloud Anomaly is located within the bandit base, but I don't think you'll have any trouble finding the artifact there.
Researchers: Bring candidate Pirogov three samples from the Graveyard of Technology
We go further, deeper into the zone. Now our interest is attracted by the Graveyard of Technology. We need to investigate the anomalies there for the samples we need.
Find an artifact in the ravine anomaly.
Find an artifact in the ravine anomaly.
Find artifact in the Sidewalk Picnic anomaly.
Find the artifact in the anomaly Picnic by the side of the road, but do not dare to make a picnic there.
Find the artifact at the Bad Earth Anomaly
Find the artifact in the Bad Earth Anomaly.
Researchers: Bring candidate Pirogov the PDA and two experimental samples

The stalker who was studying the anomalies before you is missing. He also lost valuable information about the studied anomalies in the dump. It is necessary to find his PDA with the necessary information, and then remove objects from the anomalies to study.
Find the missing stalker's palmtop
Most likely the stalker fell into the hands of bandits. But we are primarily interested in the important information on his PDA.
Find an artifact in the Circle of Witches anomaly.
Find the artifact in the Circle of Witches anomaly.
Find artifact in the anomaly Soda.
Find artifact in the anomaly Soda.
Find the artifact by the coordinates from the missing PDA
The location of the wanted specimen is unknown. First you need to find the PDA stalker who acted on Pirogov's behalf before me.
Explorers: Bring Chernov three artifacts from the Military Depot area
A test challenge for a real stalker. Find 3 unique artifacts in anomalies near the military depots.
Find an artifact in the anomaly Acid Swamp
Find an artifact in the anomaly Acid Swamp.
Find artifact in the anomaly Carousel
Find the artifact in the Carousel anomaly.
Find artifact in the anomaly "Steamer".
Find the artifact in the anomaly "Steamer".
Explorers: Bring Chernov the Rifleman's PDA and two artifacts

Strelok experienced stalker who crossed the zone. About him now the legends. We have the exact data, which provided him personally. He saved in his PDA an exact map of anomalies Red Forest. It will help us to find the next specimens we are interested in. Unfortunately the PDA itself was lost, most likely in the tunnel that Strelok blew up while running away from his pursuers.
Find the Rifleman's PDA.
Fleeing from Clear Sky, Strelok blew up his PDA in the tunnels in an attempt to confuse his pursuers. We need the data from this PDA to continue our research.
Find an artifact in the Symbiont anomaly
After analyzing the map in the PDA Strelok managed to identify the anomaly Symbiont, as necessary for examination.
Find an artifact in the underground thunderstorm anomaly
Anomaly "Underground Thunderstorm" was highlighted as necessary for examination after parsing the map in PDA Arrow.
Find the artifact somewhere in the Red Forest
The Red Forest is dangerous and treacherous. Fortunately, on the lost PDA Strelok saved a map with the anomalies we need. To find the artifacts, you must first find this PDA.
Explorers: Find the artificial artifact

According to Chernov, artifacts can be obtained artificially. It's worth searching the home of a scientist who may have been doing this before the disaster. Apparently his house was located near the place where the Generators anomaly is now marked. It might not be a coincidence.
Explorers: Find X-19 documents and artifacts

The X-19 lab was engaged in the creation of artificial artifacts. This lab is now destroyed, but perhaps the documents were able to survive. Find them. Perhaps from them you will learn where you can find the "artifact farm".
Search entrance X-19.
Perhaps this is where there is something left that points to the famous "artifact beds".
Find an artifact in the Deadwood
According to the documents, artifacts were grown in the forest like mushrooms. There are approximate coordinates of trees worth examining for anomalous objects.
Researchers: Find two artifacts in the Dead City
For a complete matrix of the Zone, scientists need to cover all areas. Right now our goal is Dead City.
Find an artifact in Gorkom.
Find an artifact in Gorkom.
Find the artifact in the House of Culture.
Find the artifact in the House of Culture.
Researchers: Find artifacts for Beetle in the vicinity of the Jupiter factory

A group of scientists is making a spectrogram of the Zone. To do this, they collect anomalous samples from all areas. In this quest you must collect 3 samples from anomalies in the vicinity of the Jupiter factory.
Find an artifact in the Bitumen anomaly
Find the artifact in the anomaly Bitumen.
Find artifact in the concrete bath anomaly
Find artifact in the anomaly Concrete Bath.
Find artifact in the Anomaly Grove
Find an artifact in the Anomaly Grove.
Researchers: Find artifacts for the Beetle in the vicinity of the Jupiter factory

A group of scientists make a spectrogram of the Zone. To do this, they collect anomalous samples from all areas. In this quest you must collect 3 samples from anomalies in the vicinity of the Jupiter factory.
Find an artifact in the anomaly Train
Unmarked anomaly Train. No one is looking for artifacts there, but that does not mean that there are no samples of interest.
Find an artifact in an abandoned tunnel
There are a lot of deadly places here that everyone bypasses. But where there is anomalous activity, there are artifacts we need.
Find an artifact in the "Volkhov" complex
The old antiaircraft missile complex is abandoned because of the abundance of underground anomalies. There are probably the right specimens there...and mutants.
Explorers: Find 4 artifacts in Pripyat
One of the most difficult assignments for scientists. They can't do it without your help. Find 4 artifacts in the ghost town of Pripyat.
Find an artifact in the Vine anomaly
Vine is the most amazing anomaly in the eastern part of Pripyat. A sample from this anomaly is a must for our collection.
Find an artifact in the School
A giant gravitational anomaly in the area of the School. For some reason is not marked on the map. However, given these wild places it is not surprising.
Find an artifact in the Vanguard anomaly.
The readings are off the charts. Even at a distance of several kilometers in the area of the stadium Vanguard found a lot of anomalous formations. Samples from that area are mandatory.
Find an artifact in the anomaly Energetic
Find an artifact in the anomaly Energy.
Researchers: Find for docent Vorobushkin memory module and 2 artifacts at Zaton

In order to complete the task of docent Vorobushkin, you must first take readings from the memory module VNZ "Circle", and then, having the necessary data to search the right anomalies for the right anomalous samples.
Find the memory module of VNZ "Circle"

Associate Professor Vorobushki placed the scanning equipment at the Circle sensing station. That's how he gathered all the information he needed about anomalies in the Zaton area. Now Vorobushkin is in a safe place, and the memory module remained at the station. To get the coordinates needed to study the anomalies you need to return this module to the scientist.
Find an artifact in the anomaly Swamp
Find the artifact in the anomaly Swamp.
Find the artifact in the anomaly Pine Oak
Find an artifact in the anomaly Sosnodub.
Find an artifact somewhere in the Zaton
In order to know the exact location of the anomalies to be surveyed, you need to take scans from the memory modules VNZ "Circle"
Researchers: Find for docent Vorobushkin 3 more artifacts at Zaton
A group of scientists make a spectrogram of the Zone. To do this, they collect anomalous samples from all areas. In this task we need to collect 3 samples from anomalies in the area of Zaton.
Find an artifact in the Cauldron anomaly
Find an artifact in the anomaly of the Cauldron.
Find an artifact in the anomaly of the Claw.
Find artifact in the anomaly of the Claw.
Find an artifact on the bridge of them. Preobrazhensky
Not all anomalies are marked on the map. Preobrazhensky Bridge, although whole, is impassable because of the strong anomalies. It is necessary to find there samples of artifacts.
Researchers: Bring Academician Skabinsky the Last Artifact
Last Phase. For this moment we trampled the entire Zone. An artifact that a group of researchers led by Academician Skabinsky dreams of getting their hands on. I hope it is worth it.
Find the artifact in the Anomaly Canyon Giga-Anomaly

Perhaps this place can be called the center of the zone. This is where all of the noosphere's perturbations begin. No one has ever explored this place. The artifact, which scientists assure you will unlock the mystery of the origin of the Zone, is located there.
Last Dawn: Return the scanner to Spore
Last Dawn: Retrieve the scanner from the anomaly in the South West corner of the swamps
Last Dawn: Return to Cold
Last Dawn: Repel the Renegade attack
Last Dawn: Return to Cold
Last Dawn: Clear the south-eastern farmstead from Renegade stalkers.
Help the Clear Sky squad hold the pump station.
Help the Clear Sky assault team capture the road to the Cordon.
The scanner is located in the Archianomaly, just North West of the Clear Sky base.
Last Dawn: Take the PDA to Spore.
Crutch didn't make it, the bloodsuckers got him, but I managed to avenge his death and get his PDA.
Last Dawn: Search for the missing scout
I need to find Crutch before some creature drags him off to it's hole. Spore reports that Crutch's last signal came from North of the Swamp Road I must hurry.
Last Dawn: Meet Cold
Cold reported that the scout's PDA has been deciphered and he is waiting to meet me.
Last Dawn: Find the Mercenary Scar
I managed to figure out where Scar is. Now my task is to find out what he knows about the missing members of Clear Sky.
Last Dawn: Fight off the mutants
Last Dawn: Talk to Scar.
There is a pack of pseudodogs thats picked up my scent, I came here to make a stand. Help me see them off and I'll tell you what you want to know.
Last Dawn: Find out about Scar.
I need to make inquiries about the Mercenary named Scar, that old crook Sdorovich should be able to point me in the right direction.
Last Dawn: talk to Strider
We have to get the decoder to Strider. His unit set up a small base of opperations in Jupiter, at the old checkpoint South of Yanov Station.
Last Dawn: Talk to Strider

Scar reported that the Clear Sky survivors may have joined the Outcasts of the Monolith. Their leader's name is Strider, his unit is located in Jupiter at the old checkpoint South of Yanov Station. I must find him and ask if he knows of the missing Clear Sky stalkers.
Last Dawn: Talk to Cold.
My mission is complete. I need to report back to Cold and tell him his men are still alive.
Last Dawn: Repel the counterattack
Last Dawn: Talk to Gamayun.
According to the Outcasts, the fanatics at the river port in the Nort East of Pripyat have a device for decoding encrypted conversations. I need to retrieve it.
Last Dawn: Seize the device
According to the Outcasts, the fanatics at the river port have a device for decoding encrypted conversations.
Last Dawn: Talk to Gamayun
Last Dawn: Rescue the rogue scout unit
A squad of Outcasts of the Monolith is trapped in eastern Pripyat, near the dormitory. Among them is one of the surviving members of Clear Sky, I have to rescue them or my mission was for nothing.
Anomalous activity scanner
Decoder
A device used by the Outcasts of the Monolith to listen in on the fanatics' conversations.
Hunter's BM-16 shotgun.
An old shotgun with a couple of markings on it.
Scar's PDA.
Among the many entries there is one very interesting one: "Strider has assembled a new group to fight the Monolith. Rumor has it that among his men are former members of Lebedev's strike team."
Heavy briefcase
A special case with loot for the Bartender.
Special device for studying anomalous fields, belonging to the group Clear Sky.
Crutch's PDA
Encrypted information related to the Clear Sky faction is stored in this PDA.
Flash drive of the madman.
The information is encrypted.
Documents from the roadblock
Military expedition report from the North of the Zone.
Compact scanner for measuring anomalous activity

The newest and convenient model for measurements, created especially for military stalkers and scientific groups, alas, for the traders is of no special value, because each scanner is individual and only starts to work when the code is entered.
Take the case to the merchant.
Steal a case from a roadblock
To climb the roadblock and from there to steal the case with the report of the military expedition from the North of the Zone.
So, what do I have to do to get information on Scar?

Well, here's the thing... A box with a report from one of the expeditions that went north was handed over to the roadblock from deep in the Zone. During the day they guard it as if it were filled with pure plutonium, but at night for some reason leave no more than two guards. Sneak up to the roadblock and get that box for me. And I'll spare no expense to you... within reason. You'll do it, won't you ?
I'll do it.
You know, I don't think so. I value my life.
Well, I've got the money ready, but don't... don't make any noise, okay? We'd all be in for a world of hurt if the military gets pissed off.
I found them, here.
Help the Clear Sky assault team capture the Machine Yard from the Military in the north of the Swamp.
Last Dawn: Destroy the Military and seize the Machine Yard.
Find the documents in the dungeon of the Agroprom Research Institute
Find secret documents that contain information about the studies conducted at the Institute and take them to Colonel Kuznetsov.
Find documents in the underground laboratory of X-18.
Colonel Kuznetsov ordered to get documents from a secret laboratory X-18. The military command wanted information about the experiments and experimentation that took place in this laboratory complex.
Find the documents in the laboratory X-16 and disable the psi-installation

The commander of the military unit in the Research Institute "Agroprom" instructed me to go to the laboratory X-16, which is located on the territory of the former lake "Yantar" and to get secret documentation and turn off the psi-installation at the same time. He also advised me to get a good psi-protection first. According to him, the scientists in the mobile bunker had just developed some means of protection against psi-radiation.
Find the documents in the X-10 lab and disable the Brain Burner.

I'm ready to break through to the North. I have protection against psi exposure, all that remains is to break through the Radar, infiltrate the laboratory, take the documents and disable the main psi installation in the Zone.
Find the documents in the X-8 lab.

I continue to collect all the mysteries of the lab experiments in the Zone for the military command. This time Kuznetsov sends me for a walk through Pripyat to find a certain laboratory X-8 which apparently was engaged in the creation of high-precision weapons whose mechanism was based on pulse energy and to extract from there all the important documents.
Find Documents in the Pripyat Dungeons
It is necessary to penetrate to the secret object Pripyat-1, referred to as Pripyat Dungeons by stalkers, to find the documents of the research which were carried out there.
Destroy the control room "Monolith" at Chernobyl and get all the documentation

I'm going on one last trip to get the final piece of documentation, at Chernobyl, to the "Monolith" control bunker, which will unlock probably the biggest mystery of the Zone: where the Executor of Wishes came from. Also, I was ordered to destroy this command post if possible. But before leaving, the colonel advised me to find a certain hermit in the swamps, the Swamp Doctor is called by the locals, he should know where the decoder to open the door to the command center is located.
Return to Colonel Kuznetsov.
Operation Monolith Revengeance: Get to the CNPP Generators
The time has come to storm the CNPP Generators. Meet the military squad at the Generators, they have taken up a position in the old village.
Capture the base
Vasil Nevezuchy.
Captain Shkryabenko
Operation Monolith Revengeance: storm the Chernobyl nuclear power plant
All units operating in the Zone are ordered to move towards the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. Operation Monolith commander "Quartet" has deployed field headquarters near the gate leading to Zaton.
Operation Monolith Revengeance: destroy the first checkpoint
Help Specnaz teams destroy the first roadblock.
Operation Monolith Revengeance: destroy the second roadblock
Help Specnaz teams destroy the second roadblock.
Operation Monolith Revengeance: destroy the third checkpoint
Help Specnaz teams destroy the third roadblock.
